content.query:
IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM sys.external_tables WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID('dbo.T_STLMSTrack') )
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.T_STLMSTrack
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.T_STLMSTrack (
[lms_track_i] int,
[lms_track_loadid] int,
[lms_track_parcelid] int,
[lms_track_waybillid] int,
[lms_track_fromlocid] int,
[lms_track_tolocid] int,
[lms_track_tracktypeid] int,
[lms_track_opendt] datetime2(7),
[lms_track_closedt] datetime2(7),
[lms_track_specdel] int,


	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Structured Data/OPS/stlmstrack.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [synapse_citylogisticsstorage_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.T_STLMSTrack 
GO
